alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oak Grove to 7 miles east of Batesburg-Leesville. Movement was north at 15 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Irmo, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Oak Grove, Harbison State Forest, Ballentine, Chapin, Gilbert, Summit, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, Murray, Rocky Point Recreation Area, Hollow Creek Public Park, and Melvin Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 58 and 64. Interstate 26 between mile markers 90 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
